map.name: kitchen
map.info:
The kitchen is a high room with many cupboards, a refrigerator, 
a sink and a cooking board. To the north there is a closed 
window. Through the courtains you can see flashing lights 
outside and the wail of police car sirens.

map.name: hallway
map.info:
The hallway is completely dark. Where you'd expect walls, 
a ceiling or a floor is pure black. Softly luminiscent doors 
and the hardness of the floor the only hints of an external reality.
